Class WarCardPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardPlayer
      • WarCardPlayer

  • public class WarCardPlayer
extends CardPlayer
    WarCardPlayer extends CardPlayer object to include a card pile, current rank and current suit of card for a game of WAR.
